strapiPost.title: Tontitown Italian Restaurant Celebrates 75 Years
strapiPost.content:
The Venesian Inn has been giving Northwest Arkansas a touch of Italy since 1947 and just celebrated its 75th anniversary! 

  • Same good food as always: The restaurant has served authentic Italian cuisine since its beginning and still has its signature menu of spaghetti and fried chicken made from scratch. Steaks and the homemade rolls are other favorite menu items. 
  • Region favorite: The Venesian Inn is family owned and keeps luring customers back again and again with its charm. It is in the Arkansas Food Hall of Fame and is listed among Americaâ€™s top old-school Italian restaurants. Venesian Inn is located at 582 W Henri De Tonti Blvd in Tontitown and is open Tuesday-Saturday 5-8p. 

Learn more about the restaurant HERE.
